backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to force light theme by default and listing related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to human-written summaries of their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a pre-hydration script that applies the stored or default light theme before React loads.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component setting the page title and rendering the full layout including header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Categories.tsx: Renders a grid of five styled fashion and beauty categories with icons, gradients, and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand info, social links, navigation lists, and dynamic year/app identifier support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with brand, navigation, theme toggle, action icons, and a mobile menu drawer.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with a gradient background, overlay image, animated text, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Newsletter.tsx: Newsletter sign-up section featuring an email input, subscribe button, and styled gradient card.
Renders a grid of trending fashion and beauty products with images, badges, and styling effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, refetching queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a placeholder example query that waits for an actor before running backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light, dark, and system themes with persistence and automatic OS preference updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a pink-themed design system with light/dark mode variables and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, containers, and animations using CSS variables.
